DOC.brief_summary: A clinical study to determine the safety, efficacy and the way sitagliptin works in patients with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus who have inadequate glycemic (blood sugar) control.
DOC.brief_title: Sitagliptin Mechanism of Action Study in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus (0431-059)
DOC.criteria: Participant has type 2 diabetes mellitus Males Females who are highly unlikely to become pregnant Participants poorly controlled without taking any, or taking one or two oral antidiabetic medications Participant has a history of type 1 diabetes mellitus or history of ketoacidosis Participant required insulin therapy within the prior 8 weeks Participant is on or has been taking TZDs such as Actos® (pioglitazone) or Avandia® (rosiglitazone) within the prior 12 weeks of the screening visit
